content: a design inspired by scandinavian sweater construction namely the stranded yoke style where decreases are masked by the pattern there are 3 different options given on how to work the leg depending on how much / how little stranded colourwork you would like to do not all of these options will work with just 50 gr of each colour - if you are restricted with the amounts of wool you have consider working these as a fraternal pair instead please note that i have only worked the pair shown in the pictures there has been no test knitting beyond this so please let me know if you run into problems and / or you find any mistakes
